structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS CONCERNING CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS

law.catch_line: Participation in global positioning monitoring system program as condition of pretrial release.
law.text: When considering the pretrial release of a person whose pretrial risk assessment indicates he or she is a moderate or high risk defendant, the court considering the release may order as a condition of pretrial release that the person participate in a global positioning monitoring system program under the same terms and conditions provided in KRS 431.517 during all or part of the person's period of pretrial release.
law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 45, effective June 8, 2011.
